titleInfo.title: HRUSOVSKY v. STOWITZSKY et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER THAT THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION OF U.S. MAGISTRATE JUDGE ELIZABETH T. HEY DATED 11/24/08 IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED; THE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IS DISMISSED; AND A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY WILL NOT ISSUE BECAUSE REASONABLE JURISTS WOULD NOT DEBATE WHETHER THE PETITION STATES A VALID CLAIM OF THE DENIAL OF A CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT OR THIS COURT'S PROCEDURAL RULINGS WITH RESPECT TO PETITIONER'S CLAIMS. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JAN E. DUBOIS ON 12/19/08. 12/22/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED TO PRO SE PETITIONER AND E-MAILED TO COUNSEL. (jpd)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:08-cv-00147; HRUSOVSKY v. STOWITZSKY et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of Pennsylvania
extension.docketText: ORDER THAT THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION OF U.S. MAGISTRATE JUDGE ELIZABETH T. HEY DATED 11/24/08 IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED; THE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IS DISMISSED; AND A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY WILL NOT ISSUE BECAUSE REASONABLE JURISTS WOULD NOT DEBATE WHETHER THE PETITION STATES A VALID CLAIM OF THE DENIAL OF A CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT OR THIS COURT'S PROCEDURAL RULINGS WITH RESPECT TO PETITIONER'S CLAIMS. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JAN E. DUBOIS ON 12/19/08. 12/22/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED TO PRO SE PETITIONER AND E-MAILED TO COUNSEL. (jpd)

titleInfo.title: HRUSOVSKY v. STOWITZSKY et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER THAT THE PETITIONER'S FIRST OBJECTIONS TO THE JUDGE'S REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION/NUNC PRO TUNC AND ADOPT WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS ARE OVERRULED IT IS FURTHER ORDERED THAT THE COURT'S 12/17/08 (DOC. NO. 18) REMAINS IN EFFECT, THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION (DOC. NO. 15) IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED AND THE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS (DOC. NO. 1) IS DISMISSED. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JAN E. DUBOIS ON 1/12/09. 1/13/09 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED FROM CHAMBERS. (jpd)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:08-cv-00147; HRUSOVSKY v. STOWITZSKY et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of Pennsylvania
extension.docketText: ORDER THAT THE PETITIONER'S FIRST OBJECTIONS TO THE JUDGE'S REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION/NUNC PRO TUNC AND ADOPT WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS ARE OVERRULED IT IS FURTHER ORDERED THAT THE COURT'S 12/17/08 (DOC. NO. 18) REMAINS IN EFFECT, THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION (DOC. NO. 15) IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED AND THE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS (DOC. NO. 1) IS DISMISSED. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JAN E. DUBOIS ON 1/12/09. 1/13/09 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED FROM CHAMBERS. (jpd)
